name: Anomalous (itch)
description:
You must find 4 Keys in the house without getting caught by the "danger".

Controls:

  • W - Jump
  • AD - Move left & right
  • LShift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump

Credits:

  • Huen: Lead Programmer, Level Design
  • Alan: Textures, UI, Lead Artist
  • Colby: 3D Modeling, Rigging
  • Meaghan: 2D Artist, UI & Logo
  • Sean: Sound Design
  • Andrew: Sound Design
  • Anthony: Programming
  • Ashley: 3D Modeling
